name: New Top Penalty Football Hero
description:
In the entertaining Penalty Football Hero, you in turn represent itself as direct and the goalkeeper.It is a fun and entertaining challenging sport-physics game. Use your boom boom football striker skills and score penalty experience to loss your opponents, Build your dream team and lead them and you must aim to kick accurate shoots.You have a final challenges match with your enemy country players and you have to win this penalty cup. Because we offering you to play Football penalty shootout game. In this game you have multiple challenging teams to flick football. You are a stick men and perfect soccer player you have to kick the football like a gun shoot. Perfect football penalty is just like a real football challenges. And you are the main football shooter and the team will become the winner on the behalf of you.
If you win this final football league then you will selected in the tournament team. It’s all about your performance. This is the top simulation game; you ever play this type off soccer game. When you select in the football team then you will become the number one player in soccer. Before play football you just set your action and then kick to football. And then focus on the player who is standing in the goal. Kick to the opposite side to the goal keeper.
If you are a street player and after complete these ultimate challenges you will know the tricks of top world famous players.
In first stages goal keeper is pretty relax but when you successfully kick of the football into goal there powers are increase and he become more sharp and stop the ball very fast. So you need extra skills for any goal.Don't shoot always in the same direction - opponent's goalkeeper is smart enough to read it! Just like in real penalty shootouts.You can become a superstar penalty striker and have a chance to win Tournament.
Features:
-Different penalty challenges.
-Real tournament environment.
-Teams off multiple countries
-HD graphics.
